001package edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.service;
002
003import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.model.domain.Card;
004import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.model.domain.Game;
005import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.model.domain.User;
006import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
007import retrofit2.http.Body;
008import retrofit2.http.GET;
009import retrofit2.http.Header;
010import retrofit2.http.POST;
011import retrofit2.http.Path;
012
013/**
014 * The {@code UnoServiceProxy} interface defines the API endpoints for interacting with the UNO web
015 * game service.
016 */
017public interface UnoServiceProxy {
018
019  /**
020   * Creates a new game.
021   * <p>
022   * If a game exists on the web server matching the provided game parameters and is not yet at max
023   * capacity, the server returns the existing game and add the user as a player rather than
024   * creating a new game from scratch.
025   * </p>
026   *
027   * @param game        the game object to be created.
028   * @param bearerToken the user's authorization token.
029   * @return a {@code Single<Game>} which emits the created Game.
030   */
031  @POST("games")
032  Single<Game> createGame(@Body Game game, @Header("Authorization") String bearerToken);
033
034  /**
035   * Starts an existing game
036   *
037   * @param gameKey     the external key associated with the game to start.
038   * @param bearerToken the user's authorization token.
039   * @return a {@code Single<Game>} which emits the started Game.
040   */
041  @POST("games/{gameKey}/start")
042  Single<Game> startGame(@Path("gameKey") String gameKey,
043      @Header("Authorization") String bearerToken);
044
045  /**
046   * Submits a players move for validation to the UNO web service.
047   *
048   * @param gameKey     the external key associated with the game for which the move is being
049   *                    submitted.
050   * @param bearerToken the user's authorization token.
051   * @param card        the Card being submitted as a player's move
052   * @return a {@code Single<Game>} which emits the updated Game after the submitted move.
053   */
054  @POST("games/{gameKey}/moves")
055  Single<Game> submitMove(@Path("gameKey") String gameKey,
056      @Header("Authorization") String bearerToken,
057      @Body Card card);
058
059  /**
060   * Submit a player's request to draw a Card from the UNO discard pile.
061   *
062   * @param gameKey     the external key associated with the game for which a card is being drawn
063   *                    for.
064   * @param bearerToken the user's authorization token.
065   * @return a {@code Single<Game>} which emits the updated Game after the card is drawn.
066   */
067  @POST("games/{gameKey}/draw")
068  Single<Game> drawCard(@Path("gameKey") String gameKey,
069      @Header("Authorization") String bearerToken);
070
071  /**
072   * Gets the user associated with the provided authentication bearer token.
073   *
074   * @param bearerToken BearerToken used to authenticate the user.
075   * @return a {@code Single<User>} which emits the User associated with provided bearer token.
076   */
077  @GET("users/me")
078  Single<User> getCurrentUser(@Header("Authorization") String bearerToken);
079
080}
